secondaries.shortDescription: At the end of your turn, score 3 victory points if two or more SPACE WOLVES units from your army are within Engagement Range of any enemy units or completed a charge move this turn, and neither of those units are within your deployment zone.

subObjectives.description: two or more SPACE WOLVES units from your army are within Engagement Range of any enemy units or completed a charge move this turn, and neither of those units are within your deployment zone.
